spec_data.Name: perl-XML-LibXML-PrettyPrint
spec_data.License: (GPL+ or Artistic) and (GPL+ or Artistic or CC-BY-SA) and Public Domain
spec_data.Description:
XML::LibXML::PrettyPrint is a Perl module that can be applied to an
XML::LibXML DOM tree to reformat it into a more readable result.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:23:31 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add pleasant white space to an XML tree
